About

I am a cognitive science student at the University of Tuebingen and have developed myPDDL in the scope of my bachelor thesis at the Wilhelm-Schickard-Institut under the supervision of Alexandra Kirsch.

If you have any questions, issues or ideas, please feel free to contact me. My email address is:
volker.strobel87@gmail.com

Important - PDDL Online Editor

Please read before opening the editor

The green link below will open the PDDL Online Editor so that you can see an example of the PDDL Syntax Highlighting. It was created with the Ace code editor. Simply paste in your code or write a new domain or problem from scratch. Although it is a fully functional code editor, myPDDL has many additional features.

Important: The editor could take some time to load. However, if it is still not loaded after a longer period of time, please refresh the editor page and make sure that JavaScript is enabled in your browser.
